group_1.narration: ―Nayuta―@And you double-checked, yes?@He truly is a mere stalker?
―Nayuta―@I was so certain he was someone@deeply tied to your past.
―Rabi―@What did you expect?@You are a third year in junior high, are you not?
―Rabi―@That guy was born and raised in Kamihama just as he said.@He has absolutely nothing to do with my life.

group_1.textRight: I have returned.
Ha―!
I was so focused on that disturbance that@I came home without buying anything.
We have rice... But no main dish.

group_1.textLeft: That's alright!@Go take a look in the refrigerator.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* Why would you...
...[wait:0.8][chara:103301:cheek_0][chara:103301:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]Ah―!
Is this...a rainbow trout...?@It's seems very big for one.
It has even been prepared, but...

group_1.textLeft: I was weeping while I kept at it,@but the only work left is to cook it.

group_1.textRight: That in itself is incredible,@but why in the world...

group_1.textLeft: Before I explain, there is one correction.
This is not just a rainbow trout,@but a triple-sized rainbow trout.
In some regions it is also called@a joō trout!

group_1.textRight: Huh, a joō trout. Joō...queen...
Eh...don't tell me...you are still hung up@on me saying you have no character...?
So you're going to mount this...?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, I did make some mistakes@while that was on my mind,
but I caught this fish called joō@for us to eat.
It was my way of apologizing - to say@that I am sorry to you, Rabi.
Besides, even if we are master and servant,@I wanted to show you that we are equals.
That is why I was hoping to get even@by making your birthday party a success -
I want to apologize to you, Rabi!

group_1.textRight: ...Well, regardless of how you did it,@your feelings were conveyed.
Rabitan, you're barely even@angry anymore!
Look at her, Rabitan's back to her@normal self.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you are right.@She is back to speaking normally.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, I suppose that is true.@Honestly, I am not that angry anymore.
Rather, I am the one who got worked up,@and felt sorry.
I was thinking it was about time to forgive.
So I will do so through a successful party.
A perfect party, if you would please.

group_1.textLeft: Please leave it all to me!
